extension.dc:title: Audubon Media Description
extension.name: Multimedia
extension.dc:description: These terms are representation-dependent metadata, referring to specific digital representations of a resource.

property.name: accessURI
property.dc:description: A URI that uniquely identifies a service that provides a representation of the underlying resource. If this resource can be acquired by an http request, its http URL should be given. If not, but it has some URI in another URI scheme, that may be given here.

property.name: format
property.dc:description: A string describing the technical format of the resource (file format or physical medium).

property.name: format
property.dc:description: URI referencing the technical format of the resource (file format or physical medium).

property.name: variantLiteral
property.dc:description: Text that describes this Service Access Point variant.

property.name: variant
property.dc:description: A URI designating what this Service Access Point provides. Some suggested values are the URIs ac:Thumbnail, ac:Trailer, ac:LowerQuality, ac:MediumQuality, ac:GoodQuality, ac:BestQuality, and ac:Offline. Additional URIs from communities of practice may be introduced.

property.name: variantDescription
property.dc:description: Text that describes this Service Access Point variant

property.name: furtherInformationURL
property.dc:description: The URL of a Web site that provides additional information about the version of the media resource that is provided by the Service Access Point.

property.name: licensingException
property.dc:description: The licensing statement for this variant of the media resource if different from that given in the License Statement property of the resource.

property.name: serviceExpectation
property.dc:description: A term that describes what service expectations users may have of the ac:accessURL. Recommended terms include online (denotes that the URL is expected to deliver the resource), authenticate (denotes that the URL delivers a login or other authentication interface requiring completion before delivery of the resource) published(non digital) (denotes that the URL is the identifier of a non-digital published work, for example a doi.) Communities should develop their own controlled vocabularies for Service Expectations.

property.name: hashFunction
property.dc:description: The cryptographic hash function used to compute the value given in the Hash Value.

property.name: hashValue
property.dc:description: The value computed by a hash function applied to the media that will be delivered at the access point.

property.name: PixelXDimension
property.dc:description: The width in pixels of the media specified by the access point.

property.name: PixelYDimension
property.dc:description: The height in pixels of the media specified by the access point.
